name: MISSISSIPPI BAND OF CHOCTAW INDIANS
sampleDescriptions: Provisions related to farm bill.
All provisions related to congressional directed spending.
Provisions related to taxation or tax reform that may affect Indian country.
All provisions related to or impacting P.L. 100-497, The Indiana Gaming Regulatory Act.
All provisions relating to acquisition practices of the federal government and programs of the Small Business Administration relating to procurement.
All provisions related to congressional directed spending and Native American affairs.
Legislation and regulations involving Native American affairs, including all provisions related to congressional directed spending.
All provisions related to congressional directed spending; re-authorization of the Violence Against Women Act, and related provisions.

All provisions related to congressional directed spending and Native American affairs, including provisions relating to P.L 100-497, The Indian Gaming Regulatory Act, Violence Against Women Act, practices of the federal government and programs of SBA procurement, taxation and tax reform affecting Indian country, and farm-related bills or regulations.

All provisions related to congressional directed spending and Native American affairs, including provisions relating to P.L. 100-497, the Indian Gaming Regulatory Act, Violence Against Women Act, practices of the federal government and programs of SBA procurement, taxation and tax reform affecting Indian country, and farm-related bills or regulations.

All provisions related to congressional directed spending and Native American affairs, including provisions relationg to P.L. 100-497, the Indian Gaming Regulatory Act, Violence Against Women Act, practices of the federal government and programs of SBA procurement, taxation and tax reform affecting Indian country, and farm-related bills or regulations.

H.R. 2617, 2023 Consolidated Appropriations Act, all provisions related to congressional directed spending, matters affecting taxation, and Native American affairs; lobbying in advance of the Farm Bill; lobbying related to tribal recognition matters; regulatory and agency policy matters regarding tribal interests.
H.R.4366, Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2024; H.R.2882, Further Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2024; Fiscal Year 2025 Appropriations Acts.
Monitor and comment on gaming regulations as applied to Tribes.

H.R.4366, Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2024; H.R.2882, Further Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2024; Fiscal Year 2025 Appropriations Acts; Implementation of the Indian Self-Determination Education and Assistance Act (ISDEAA), including the 105(l) lease program; Native American Housing Assistance and Self-Determination Act of 2023; monitor and comment on gaming regulations as applied to Tribes; monitor and comment on tax regulations as applied to Tribes.
Monitor and comment on tax regulations as applied to Tribes.
Fiscal Year 2025 Appropriations Acts.

Fiscal Year 2025 Appropriations Acts; Implementation of the Indian Self-Determination Education and Assistance Act (ISDEAA), including the 105(l) lease program; Native American Housing Assistance and Self-Determination Act of 2023; monitor and comment on gaming regulations as applied to Tribes; monitor and comment on tax regulations as applied to Tribes.
Farm, Food and National Security Act of 2024 (Farm Bill), provisions related to tribal matters and land use.
Fiscal Year 2025 Appropriations Acts, all provisions relating to Tribes, specifically H.R. 8998 and S. 4802, Interior-Environment Appropriations bill.
